name: Sleepless (Gensu)
description:
The goal is to escape the room you seem to be trapped in.. There aren't many clues to go by , but there is a  few different ways you can escape, you can collect coins also for extra points that will be added to your remaining completion time.

  • Added an Option to "Throw"  stuff but didn't write it in UI .. this serves no real goal purpose, just fun to do. You can use the keyboard "T" button once you have object in hand.
  • keyboard "E"  button is to Drop Item.

Side note

Windows version works better right now, I recommend  you play that version instead.
the lighting on WebGL version is messed up for some reason and everything is bright, I will figure it out eventually and fix it.

PS: would love to know of any bug or glitches , and how you have encountered.

Enjoy.
